text: “(allahge) dutayada (ohuva) visvasa kala ayada, (yuddhayen pasu) tamange pavule udaviya veta kisi kalekat apasu nopæminennaha yayi niyata vasayenma oba adahas karamin sitiyehuya. (ebævinma oba yuddhayata pæminiye næta). meyama obage manasehi alamkaravat kara tibuni. ebævin oba napuru situvillama sitamin sitiyehuya. ebævin obama vinasa vana janatavak bavata pat vuvehuya” (yayi nabiye! oba pavasanu mænava)
